name: 2nd Annual Inhalation & Respiratory Drug Delivery Congress
content: Oxford Global are proud to present our 2017 2nd Annual Inhalation & Respiratory Drug Delivery Congress, taking place on 8 â€“ 9 May 2017 in London, UK. Over 300 delegates representing global pharmaceutical organisations, leading biotech companies and internationally renowned academic institutions will have the opportunity to discuss over 40 presentations and case studies focused on the key issues in inhalation and respiratory drug delivery. Including 4 interactive streams: Development & Formulation of Inhaled Therapies and Inhalation Devices & Analytics. Download Agenda Now: http://bit.ly/1NGMsPG. For further information regarding prices and possible discounts, please contact Guillaume Alonso on g.alonso@oxfordglobal.co.uk or call +44 (0)1865 248 455.
